name: TANKTRONIX
description:
Good day Commander!

Do you like tanks? Do you like retro style graphics? Do you like online multiplayer mayhem? If your answers are yes, this is your game. Burst your way through the vector battlefield, leaving nothing behind just burning pixels.

Let’s see the features:

  • Tanks
  • Instant action (no download, no installer)
  • Retro style vector graphics
  • Multiplayer mode
  • More tanks
  • Online leaderboard (daily and weekly)
  • Coloured vectors
  • …and of course, more tanks

Default controls:

  • Moving: WASD or arrow keys
  • Aiming: mouse
  • Primary weapon: left mouse button or SPACE
  • Secondary weapon: right mouse button or CTRL
  • Scoreboard: TAB
  • Toggle full screen: F 

…and finally, don’t forget commander: a destroyed tank is a good tank!
